channel.title: not able to login in Whonix
channel.description: I m unable to login whonix using defaukt user_name "user", it show error, " couldn't create var/log/tallylog: Read Only file system " plz help anyone,

item.title: not able to login in Whonix
item.dc:creator: Gothmoneyxenia
item.description:
In Virtual Box right click on Workstation -> Show in File Manager or just open that folder (you needa open VirtualBox VMs folder) and all i did changed all the folder permissions from access to create and delete that’s all and helped me
